statements: DELETE FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE target_audience = 'Social Media';
DELETE FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE campaign_id = 1001 AND end_date < '2022-12-31';
DELETE FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND budget > 5000.00;
DELETE FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE region = 'North America';

DELETE FROM Campaign_Results WHERE conversion_success = true AND campaign_id = 200;
